sentences.en: a glass with a slender stem
Blonde and slender, she was too striking to escape their attention.
sentences.cn: 金发细腰的她太引人注目了，他们很难不注意到她。

sentences.en: Everybody of us admired her slender figure.
sentences.cn: 我们人人都羡慕她的苗条身材.

sentences.en: He gazed at her slender neck.
sentences.cn: 他凝视着她优美的颈部。

sentences.en: Her legs were long and fine, her hips slender, her carriage erect.
His musical achievements have been decidedly slender.
sentences.cn: 他在音乐上的成就微不足道.

sentences.en: My idea of physical perfection is to be very slender.
sentences.cn: 在我看来，要拥有完美身材就要非常苗条。

sentences.en: Sarah looked slender-waisted, fragile and very beautiful.
sentences.cn: 萨拉纤纤细腰，弱不禁风，楚楚动人。

sentences.en: She was slender, with delicate wrists and ankles.
sentences.cn: 她身量苗条，手腕和脚踝曲线玲珑。

sentences.en: Sherry is black, tall, slender and soft-spoken.
sentences.cn: 谢里是个黑人，身材高挑，细声细语。

sentences.en: The builders have perched a light concrete dome on eight slender columns.
sentences.cn: 建筑工人在8根细柱上架起轻巧的混凝土穹顶。

sentences.en: The company only has a slender hope of survival.
sentences.cn: 这家公司维持下去的希望很渺茫。

sentences.en: The girl has a tall and slender figure.
The girl was pretty and slender.
The spider hung suspended on its slender thread.
sentences.cn: 蜘蛛悬吊在它细长的丝上.

sentences.en: They won the election but only with a very slender majority.
sentences.cn: 他们仅以微弱的多数赢得了选举.

trans.tran_en: thin in an attractive or graceful way
